channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Lenovo Fingerprint Manager Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Lenovo Fingerprint Manager Pro

item.title: CVE-2017-3762|2024-09-16T16:24:14.952Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- lenovo%20fingerprint%20manager%20pro
item.description: Sensitive data stored by Lenovo Fingerprint Manager Pro, version 8.01.86 and earlier, including users' Windows logon credentials and fingerprint data, is encrypted using a weak algorithm, contains a hard-coded password, and is accessible to all users with local non-administrative access to the system in which it is installed.
